FuncDef: When this command is enabled, packets received on a SAP or a spoke-SDP with an unknown source MAC address will be dropped only if the maximum number of MAC addresses for that SAP or spoke-SDP (seemax-nbr-mac-addr) has been reached. Ifmax-nbr-mac-addrhas not been set for the SAP or spoke-SDP, enablingdiscard-unknown-sourcehas no effect.
